summary: A player home on the coast of Solstheim, near Raven Rock but far enough for its secondary purpose as an observatory!
descriptionHtml:
I hate to only be contributing player homes to the Nexus, but hey, it's my passion. I do love making beautiful looking homes. This one is no different in the exotic lands of Solstheim!

Corvus Mill is not only a windmill, but an observatory with variable lighting (the telescope, unfortunately, purely for aesthetics and roleplay). It hosts a nice small living room for dining and audiences, one manikin, several display racks, two display cases, and your usual crafting stations. The windowed living room has its day/night cycle, and the whole house (though lower class) is made for comfort in the uncomfortable ash-fallen lands of Solstheim. On the exterior you'll find a small garden with grain for the mill, rare livestock, a patio with woodchopping block, an outhouse and small roofed dock for a rowboat.

It may be small, but it's not bad for an alternative to Severin Manor, and should be fair competition to other Solstheim homes even if it relies only on vanilla resources. I'll hope you find it as interesting to live as I do!

It is located north of the Skaal stone in Raven Rock along the coast, right next to a treasure site for one of the sidequests. No conflicting navmeshes there, and everything else should flow just fine.

Requirements: Dragonborn.
author: ClefJ
